text: “napura karana kisivekuṭat ē andamaṭama misa, (eyaṭa adhika vaśayen) ohuṭa phalavipāka denu labannē næta. tavada dæhæmi kriyāvan karana kisivekut satya viśvāsavantayin vaśayen siṭiyahot pirimi vuvada, gæhænu vuvada niyata vaśayenma svargayehi ætuḷu vannāha. ehi apramāṇavama (illana siyalla) denu labannāha”
